short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Takes text copied to the clipboard and inserts it into the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension that takes text copied to the clipboard and inserts it into the page.

- Only runs on a single site/tab at a time in order to limit the access it has.
- Remembers the last site you enabled it on and switches on automatically.
- Disabled automatically when navigating away or closing the tab/window.
- Important note: Attempts to clear your clipboard on activation so that you don't inadvertently paste something that was on the clipboard beforehand.
